name: Clash of the Talons
description:
Go ahead, get wild! Become a modern day raptor and tear apart the competition in this head to head battle of the ages. Ten unique birds clash as they hunt for prey in five distinct environments. Do you have talons strong enough, dives fast enough, and eyes sharp enough to fly your way to victory?




Clash of the Talons was created by Last Hour Games in collaboration with experts from the Royal Ontario Museum. With battles staged in real-life ecosystems from across North America, Clash of the Talons is a tribute to the power, skills, and beauty of the birds of prey throughout our continent.

Try The Demo for both Windows and Mac





A portion of each sale goes to support the Royal Ontario Museum
